response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I am confident it will be a valuable asset to you. Considering its intrinsic worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $10,000. This represents a significant saving compared to the market value, making it a great opportunity for you. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information about the product. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 10000}
